servo.h

00001 // ***************************
00002 // SERVO FUNCTIONS AND DEFINES
00003 // ***************************
00004 #ifndef SERVO_H
00005 #define SERVO_H
00006 #include "driverlib/pwm.h"
00007 
00008 //*****************************************************************************
00009 //
00010 // If building with a C++ compiler, make all of the definitions in this header
00011 // have a C binding.
00012 //
00013 //*****************************************************************************
00014 #ifdef __cplusplus
00015 extern "C"
00016 {
00017 #endif
00018 
00019 typedef unsigned char position_t;                       // angle data type
00020 typedef enum {
00021         SERVO_0 = PWM_OUT_0,
00022         SERVO_1 = PWM_OUT_1,
00023         SERVO_2 = PWM_OUT_2,
00024         SERVO_3 = PWM_OUT_3 } servo_t;          // servo data type
00025 
00026 #define SERVO_MIN_POSITION              0
00027 #define SERVO_NEUTRAL_POSITION  128
00028 #define SERVO_MAX_POSITION              255
00029 
00030 // Summary:     Initializes the appropriate PWMs for servo output
00031 // Note:        Always call this function before any other servo-related functions
00032 extern void InitializeServos(void);
00033 
00034 // Summary: Sets the specified servo's position
00035 // Parameters:
00036 //              servo:  SERVO_0 SERVO_1 SERVO_2 SERVO_3
00037 //              angle:  sets servo to the specified position
00038 //                              0 is turned counterclockwise, 128 is neutral, 255 is turned clockwise
00039 extern void SetServoPosition(servo_t servo, position_t position);
00040 
00041 //*****************************************************************************
00042 //
00043 // Mark the end of the C bindings section for C++ compilers.
00044 //
00045 //*****************************************************************************
00046 #ifdef __cplusplus
00047 }
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #endif // SERVO_H
